hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
chmod +x /srv/rekor/rekor ls -al /srv/rekor/rekor /srv/rekor/rekor version LIST=$(find /srv/repository/ -iname '*.dsc' -o -iname '*.xz')
for f in $LIST; do echo $f; mkdir -p /srv/rekor/$(dirname $f)/
if test ! -f /srv/rekor/$f.asc; then gpg --batch --yes --armor -u sylvestre@debian.org --output /srv/rekor/$f.asc --detach-sig $f fi
url=https://apt.llvm.org/$(echo $f|sed -e "s|/srv/repository/||g") if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail $url; then /srv/rekor/rekor upload --rekor_server https://rekor.sigstore.dev --signature /srv/rekor/$f.asc --public-key ~/mypublickey.key --artifact $url /srv/rekor/rekor verify --rekor_server https://rekor.sigstore.dev --signature /srv/rekor/$f.asc --public-key ~/mypublickey.key --artifact $url else echo "$url failed" >> /tmp/fail.txt fi done
cat /tmp/fail.txt rm /tmp/fail.txt
